scripts.build: pyinstaller -F pulsar.py --hidden-import eventlet.hubs.epolls --hidden-import eventlet.hubs.kqueue --hidden-import eventlet.hubs.selects --hidden-import engineio.async_drivers.eventlet --hidden-import dns --hidden-import dns.dnssec --hidden-import dns.e164 --hidden-import dns.hash --hidden-import dns.namedict --hidden-import dns.tsigkeyring --hidden-import dns.update --hidden-import dns.version --hidden-import dns.zone
